snippet: Carl M. Sciortino Jr., a Massachusetts state representative who is running in a special Democratic primary for the Fifth Congressional District seat, released a jovial television advertisement on Tuesday starring his father, a Tea Party Republican.
abstract: Carl M. Sciortino Jr., a Massachusetts state representative who is running in a special Democratic primary for the Fifth Congressional District seat, released a jovial television advertisement on Tuesday starring his father, a Tea Party Republican.

headline.main: Father and Son Declare a Political Truce, for 60 Seconds
